hypothesis_content.title: UK Crypto Regulatory Clarity as Bull Regime Catalyst
hypothesis_content.statement: The UK's formal crypto regulatory framework announcement (2027 implementation) triggers a regime transition from NEUTRAL to BULL within 5 trading days when combined with positive BTC price action above key moving averages.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Major regulatory clarity from a G7 economy reduces systemic risk premium for crypto assets. The UK framework provides institutional adoption runway while current neutral regime allows for asymmetric upside if sentiment shifts.
entry_conditions: UK crypto regulatory framework officially announced with 2027 timeline
Crypto Fear & Greed Index < 50 (shows room for improvement)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry or regime indicator confirms BULL (confidence > 70%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 8% loss from entry or BTC breaks below 50-day SMA
exit_conditions.time_exit: 10 trading days without regime transition confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: No regime transition occurs within 10 days despite announcement, or BTC fails to hold above key moving averages within 3 days of announcement.
